market.simulation-title: Select the amount to be invested

register.natural-mode-description: Be part of the world's biggest investment revolution
register.agree-terms: I agree with the platform's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

profile.system-apperence-desc: Change the appearance of the interface as you like.
profile.security-desc: You can change your security information.
profile.order-history-desc: You can view all your deposit and withdrawal orders.
profile.notification-desc: You can turn your notifications on or off whenever you want.
profile.receive-email-desc: Do you want to enable Email notifications?
profile.receive-invest-email-desc: Do you want to receive investment recommendations by email?
profile.term-desc: Your platform terms of use consensus agreement.
profile.invest-limit-title: This is your investment limit consensus agreement
profile.invest-limit-desc: According to SEC Resolution 88, there is a limit for investment in all crowdfunding platforms and in Bio Investment in the calendar year. To determine it, fill in the fields below and we will indicate the maximum amount you can invest and trade.
profile.invest-limit-gross-desc: The amount must be between BRL 200,000 and BRL 1,000,000.
profile.invest-mode-0: I have annual gross income or financial investments up to BRL 200,000.00 (two hundred thousand reais).
profile.invest-mode-1: I have annual gross income or investments greater than BRL 200,000.00 (two hundred thousand reais).
profile.invest-mode-1-label: Greater value between annual gross income and financial investments
profile.invest-mode-2: I have financial investments of more than BRL 1,000,000.00 (one million reais), being a qualified investor. Therefore, I have no investment limits.
profile.invest-other: I made investments in other public offering platforms for the distribution of securities issued by a company small business carried out with waiver of registration through the participatory investment electronic platform in this calendar year.
profile.invest-other-label: Amount invested in other platforms in the current year.
profile.invest-limit-footer-1: So you can invest up to BRL 20,000.00
profile.invest-limit-footer-2: Remembering that this information is self-declaratory and must be updated in your profile.
profile.invest-declare: I declare that I will update my information on Bio Investment and if I make more investments on other platforms crowdfunding in the calendar year.
